animeTitle: Kare Baka: Wagahai no Kare wa Baka de R
animeDescription: Centers around a girl named Akomi and her boyfriend Ponta Ninomiya. Ninomiya is a massive idiot who has no redeeming qualities aside from being really handsome. Follows the couple's everyday lives.  (Source: ANN)
